m_szDocTitle: Why Tesla (TSLA) Stock is Climbing in Pre-Market Trading Today - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: Why Tesla (TSLA) Stock is Climbing in Pre-Market Trading Today By Tony Owusu | 11/04/15 - 08:56 AM EST NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) are up by 7.8% to $224.58 in pre-market trading on Wednesday, after the electric vehicle maker topped its own third quarter vehicle delivery expectations. The company delivered 11,603 vehicles in the quarter, slightly topping the 11,580 vehicles it forecast in October. For the current quarter, the Elon Musk owned company is expecting to deliver between 17,000 and 19,000 vehicles. The company also announced that it will lau
